casebody.data:
Lisa BALDUCCI, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Brian M. CIGE, Defendant-Petitioner. C-584 September Term 2018
081877 Supreme Court of New Jersey. Filed March 08, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003068-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted, limited to the issues articulated in points I and II of defendant's petition, including defendant's challenge to the appellate panel's purported creation of, and retroactive application of, "a new rule of professional conduct," and the panel's invalidation of the retainer agreement.
